body: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Put a Death Baron card into play, while the opponent has a Zombie in play What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Only my Zombie creatures, other than the Baron itself, should get +1/+1. Instead, it seems all Zombies get pumped - mine, opponent's, and the Baron itself. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.21 on Windows XP

_From [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/) on December 30, 2011 05:57:00_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Put a Death Baron card into play, while the opponent has a Zombie in play What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Only my Zombie creatures, other than the Baron itself, should get +1/+1. Instead, it seems all Zombies get pumped - mine, opponent's, and the Baron itself. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.21 on Windows XP
